snippet: Our current medical education system is ill-equipped to train the number of professionals we need.
abstract: Editorial contends dearth of doctors, nurse and other clinicians at Veterans Affairs Dept is emblematic of nationwide shortage of doctors, particularly primary doctors, and other health care professionals; warns that current medical education system is ill-equipped to train number of professionals needed, and questions whether Congress will do what is necessary to address crisis.
lead_paragraph: Our current medical education system is ill-equipped to train the number of professionals we need.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
